description: Adobo Connection celebrates the Philippines’ national dish by providing traditional but innovative versions of pork, chicken, and beef adobo in a fast-casual dining setting.
Adphorus is a leading performance marketing platform and Facebook Marketing Partner based in Istanbul.
Aemulus designs cheaper and faster automated test equipment (ATE) as well as test and measuring instruments (TMI) for the semiconductor industry.
Aerobotics is an agtech data analytics company from South Africa.

Africa Healthcare Network (AHN) is a network of dialysis clinics partnering with hospitals to provide high-quality life-saving dialysis at an affordable cost in the underserved Sub-Saharan Africa market.

Africa’s Talking is the leading customer engagement platform in Sub-saharan Africa, working with the fastest growing startups in the region to help them build highly personalized communication and payment experiences for customers.
Agate Studio is a game development studio, creating a wide array of B2C games available on mobile apps and online, including the popular and award-winning Football Saga 2.
AgIdea developed a contract research platform which provides scientific support to R&D and regulatory projects.
Agrofy is a global agribusiness e-commerce ecosystem.
Aguamarina is an industrial biotechnology company for the mining sector, working on making mining a more sustainable – and ultimately “zero-waste” – activity.

AIM offers property management software for large-scale real estate operators (supermarkets, malls etc). Its services include inventory control, assets and maintenance, access control, communications and operating efficiency.
AirTies provides wireless solutions for the residential and small business market in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa.
Aiva is a company specialized in wealth management solutions for affluent and high-net-worth clients in Latin America and the Caribbean.
Aivo provides artificial intelligence communication solutions with the aim of transforming the way companies and customers interact.
Akervall Technologies produces SISU™, a mouth guard for sports, and SOVA™, a night guard for grinding, that are thinner, stronger and much more comfortable than conventional mouth guards.
Akinon is an omnichannel commerce platform designed to streamline retail sales from online and physical stores.
Al Ameed Coffee is the region’s leading quality oriented coffee manufacturing and retail company based in Jordan.
Al Sagheer Group provides French-inspired beauty services, bringing consistent, high quality products and services to the Egyptian beauty industry.
Al-Hatab Bakery is a retail chain in Saudi Arabia selling a wide variety of baked goods and gourmet specialties catered to local tastes.
Albo is a Mexican challenger bank, offering mobile banking, virtual/physical cards, peer-to-peer transactions, bill pay, cash advance loans, and budgeting tools and services for customers.
